meanings.definition: The quality or state of being manageable.
meanings.sent1: Her manageabilities made her a great team leader.
meanings.sent2: The teacher praised the student for his excellent manageabilities.
meanings.sent3: The manageabilities of the new puppy made training a breeze.
meanings.sent4: The manageabilities of the puzzle were evident as it was quickly solved.
meanings.sent5: The manageabilities of the computer system ensured smooth operations.

meanings.definition: The ability to be managed or controlled.
meanings.sent1: The manager was impressed by the team's manageabilities during the project.
meanings.sent2: The manageabilities of the situation were put to the test during the crisis.
meanings.sent3: The manageabilities of the mischievous toddler were constantly challenged.
meanings.sent4: The manageabilities of the wild horse were finally tamed by the trainer.
meanings.sent5: The manageabilities of the weather determined the success of the outdoor event.
